00028 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #include "ht32.h"
00030 #include "ht32_board.h"
00031 
00032 /** @addtogroup HT32_Series_Peripheral_Examples HT32 Peripheral Examples
00033   * @{
00034   */
00035 
00036 /** @addtogroup BFTM_Examples BFTM
00037   * @{
00038   */
00039 
00040 /** @addtogroup OneShot
00041   * @{
00042   */
00043 
00044 /* Settings ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00045 #define HTCFG_ONESHOT_IPN                         BFTM0
00046 #define HTCFG_ONESHOT_PORT                        STRCAT2(HT_, HTCFG_ONESHOT_IPN)
00047 #define HTCFG_ONESHOT_CLKPRE                      STRCAT2(CKCU_PCLK_, HTCFG_ONESHOT_IPN)
00048 #define COMPARE_MATCH_COUNTER                     (245)
00049 
00050 /* Private macro -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00051 
00052 /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00053    The actually delay will be large then the calculation result since the code execution overhead.
00054 */
00055 #if 1
00056 // Direct register access to reduce time overhead error
00057 #define OneShot_Delay(cnt)                        {HTCFG_ONESHOT_PORT->SR = 0;\
00058                                                    HTCFG_ONESHOT_PORT->CMP = cnt;\
00059                                                    HTCFG_ONESHOT_PORT->CR |= (1 << 2);\
00060                                                    while (HTCFG_ONESHOT_PORT->SR == 0){};}
00061 #else
00062 #define OneShot_Delay(cnt)                        {BFTM_ClearFlag(HTCFG_ONESHOT_PORT);\
00063                                                    BFTM_SetCompare(HTCFG_ONESHOT_PORT, cnt);\
00064                                                    BFTM_EnaCmd(HTCFG_ONESHOT_PORT, ENABLE);\
00065                                                    while (BFTM_GetFlagStatus(HTCFG_ONESHOT_PORT) != SET){};}
00066 #endif
00067 
00068 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00069 void BFTM_Configuration(void);
00070 void OneShotFun1(void);
00071 void OneShotFun2(void);
00072 
00073 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00074 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00075   * @brief  Main program.
00076   * @retval None
00077   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00078 int main(void)
00079 {
00080   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED1);
00081 
00082   BFTM_Configuration();
00083 
00084   OneShotFun1();
00085 
00086   while (1)
00087   {
00088     OneShotFun2();
00089   }
00090 }
00091 
00092 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00093   * @brief  BFTM Configuration.
00094   * @retval None
00095   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00096 void BFTM_Configuration(void)
00097 {
00098   #if 0 // Use following function to configure the IP clock speed.
00099   CKCU_SetPeripPrescaler(HTCFG_ONESHOT_CLKPRE, CKCU_APBCLKPRE_DIV2);
00100   #endif
00101 
00102   { /* Enable peripheral clock                                                                              */
00103     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00104     CKCUClock.Bit.HTCFG_ONESHOT_IPN = 1;
00105     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00106   }
00107 
00108   /* BFTM as one shot mode                                                                                  */
00109   BFTM_SetCounter(HTCFG_ONESHOT_PORT, 0);
00110   BFTM_OneShotModeCmd(HTCFG_ONESHOT_PORT, ENABLE);
00111 }
00112 
00113 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00114   * @brief  One Shot test example.
00115   * @retval None
00116   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00117 void OneShotFun1(void)
00118 {
00119   HT32F_DVB_LEDOn(HT_LED1);
00120 
00121   /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00122      The actually delay will be large then the (SystemCoreClock / n) calculation result
00123      since the code execution overhead.
00124   */
00125   OneShot_Delay(48000);         // T = (cnt + 1) * (1 / BFTM PCLK)
00126   HT32F_DVB_LEDOff(HT_LED1);
00127 
00128   OneShot_Delay(720);
00129   HT32F_DVB_LEDOn(HT_LED1);
00130 
00131   OneShot_Delay(48);
00132   HT32F_DVB_LEDOff(HT_LED1);
00133 }
00134 
00135 
00136 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00137   * @brief  One Shot test example 2.
00138   * @retval None
00139   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00140 #if (LIBCFG_BFTM_16BIT_COUNTER)
00141 void OneShotFun2(void)
00142 {
00143   u32 i;
00144 
00145   for (i = COMPARE_MATCH_COUNTER; i != 0; i--)
00146   {
00147     OneShot_Delay(0xFFFF);
00148   }
00149 
00150   HT32F_DVB_LEDToggle(HT_LED1);
00151 }
00152 #else
00153 void OneShotFun2(void)
00154 {
00155   OneShot_Delay(SystemCoreClock);
00156   HT32F_DVB_LEDToggle(HT_LED1);
00157 }
00158 #endif
00159 
00160 #if (HT32_LIB_DEBUG == 1)
00161 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00162   * @brief  Report both the error name of the source file and the source line number.
00163   * @param  filename: pointer to the source file name.
00164   * @param  uline: error line source number.
00165   * @retval None
00166   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00167 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)
00168 {
00169   /*
00170      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00171      Debug message can be added here.
00172      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00173   */
00174 
00175   while (1)
00176   {
00177   }
00178 }
00179 #endif
